QuestData.Title: Cannonball Swim
QuestData.Description: Help out a fellow swabbie?$b$bKeelhaul asked me to gather up some cannonballs at the bottom of the ocean. Let me tell you why this doesn't work for me.$b$b- One: I have tiny arms. Look at them! Do you really think I can pick up a cannonball, even underwater?$b$b- Two: I have a weak respiratory system. I start to white out after holding my breath for more than ten seconds.$b$b- Three: There are sharks.$b$bYou gotta help me, $n! I've been demoted as far as I can... I don't want to see what comes next!
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 6 Bloodsail Cannonballs from the water beneath the Riptide.
QuestData.CompletionText: I wasn't always a swabbie, you know.
QuestData.RewardText: Thanks, $n. I'd been hearing whispers about "Pretty Boy" and a "boo-box". I don't think I want to go in the boo-box.
